description: Unit test file for the YouTubeReader class in the agno.document.reader.youtube_reader module, testing its read and async_read methods with various scenarios including chunking, invalid URLs, API errors, large transcripts, and unicode content.

classes.name: Document
classes.description: Data class representing a document with attributes such as name, id, content, and meta_data.

classes.name: YouTubeReader
classes.description: Class responsible for reading YouTube video transcripts and converting them into Document objects, with support for chunking and asynchronous operations.

methods.name: read
methods.description: Method to read a YouTube video URL and return a list of Document objects synchronously.

methods.name: async_read
methods.description: Asynchronous method to read a YouTube video URL and return a list of Document objects.
